docTitle.titlePart: Tucson Planned Parenthood Annual Fundraising Drive

sourceDesc.bibl: Mrs. Slee is Honored Speaker, Tucson Daily Citizen, Jan. 10, 1953

docBody.head: Mrs. Slee is Honored Speaker
docBody.p: "The conducting, co-ordinating, and promoting of scientific research in the field of human reproduction must take precedence over all other projects planned and supported by the Planned Parenthood Federation of America," stated Mrs. Margaret Sanger Slee, speaking to the campaign workers for the Tucson Planned Parenthood clinic's annual fund raising drive.
